content: introducing the crocheted coronation british bulldog - the latest addition to the woolbox family to celebrate the coronation of hrh the king s coronation woolbox have worked with the incredibly talented heather gibbs of keep calm & crochet on to bring to you our union jack dressed british bulldog this is the yarn you will require 1 x 100g woolbox imagine classic anti-pilling dk - autumn brown 204 1 x 100g woolbox imagine classic anti-pilling dk - pure white 201 1 x 100g woolbox imagine classic anti-pilling dk - azure blue 209 1 x 100g woolbox imagine classic anti-pilling dk - twilight black 206 1 x 100g woolbox imagine classic anti-pilling dk - ruby red 217 1 x 9mm toy safety eyes - pack of 2 the finished british bulldog with measure approximately 18cm the pattern will be free to download through the website this pattern would suit an intermediate crocheter the yarn pack for this project can be purchased here https //www woolbox co uk/crocheted-coronation-british-bulldog-in-woolbox-imagine-classic-dk-5x100g-52644 html 1 1 https //www woolbox co uk/crocheted-coronation-british-bulldog-in-woolbox-imagine-classic-dk-5x100g-52644 html
